text: Monfalcone (; ) is a city in northern Italy. Monfalcone is in the Friuli- Venezia Giulia Region. About 30,000 people live there. About 30% in 2023 were foreign nationals, mostly Bangladeshi Muslims. The mayor has opposed proposals to build a mosque in the town. There is a large shipyard where cruise ships are built. It is the northernmost port city on the Mediterranean Sea. ==References== Category:Cities in Friuli-Venezia Giulia Category:Settlements in Gorizia
title: Monfalcone
